amendment.description: To provide funds for the conduct of a grant program to strengthen local capacity on Native American reservations to screen for and treat sexually transmitted diseases.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1626 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1626 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11322) To provide funds for the conduct of a grant program to strengthen local capacity on Native American reservations to screen for and treat sexually transmitted diseases.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1626 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1626 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1542.
